title: Ground News - Drenching downpour to bring flood threat to New York City, Tri-State area
text:
Summary by Abc 7 NY An AccuWeather Alert is in effect for heavy rain that will drench NYC on Saturday, with the potential for flooding on streets and highways. Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
